phrases: Once upon a time, there was a maiden in love.
I want to tell my beloved how I feel, but my love might be over the moment I say it.
Every day she suffered, agonizing in this way.
She took no meals, and she was unable even to sleep.
And finally, she died without ever having been able to communicate her feelings.
But the man she loved married another woman and lived happily ever after, without ever even knowing the maiden had existed.
Oh, I fell asleep while I was still a duck.
I wonder if Fakir bandaged this for me.
The prince's pride has returned to him.
Now all the shards of the prince's heart have returned to him!
That is right, he must be suffering right about now.
Because he does not have ALL of the heart shards yet.
But you just said they would all returned...
The shards that were hidden inside chinks in other people's hearts have all been returned now!
But those are not ALL the shards.
His heart has to keep the raven from moving, after all.
That IS why it was shattered.
Oh, dear, I do not have time for this!
Where is the rest of his heart?!
The prince's heart is being dyed in raven's blood!
Can I put it back to normal?
We will have the opportunity to meet again...when I feel like it.
It looks like when I meet Drosselmeyer-san, time stops.
You can come in now, Fakir.
He said the rest of the heart shards were sealing away the raven.
And... that the heart shards I returned to Mytho are hurting him.
If Drosselmeyer is right, the moment the rest of the heart shards are returned will be the moment of the raven's resurrection.
In other words, the moment when the fight begins.
Mytho has to be prepared for some suffering already.
If you are not prepared to handle that too, you should stop being Princess Tutu.
I will protect Mytho with my sword.
Um, I do not really want you brandishing a sword.
I mean, it is dangerous and stuff...
So you do not acknowledge me as a knight?
I mean, you have been doing research in books and stuff all this time.
So I just think you could be a knight like that instead of...
If your wounds have healed, then go home.
Oh, thank you for bandaging me.
A knight who cannot even protect a princess, huh?
A knight who could not even die.
In the story, you are no longer needed.
Will the story stay exactly the same whether I am here or not?
Fakir was acting strange, getting mad and then suddenly getting depressed...
You were mere centimeters from marrying Cat-sensei!
Thinking about Fakir-sama, I will bet!
You want to tell him how you feel, do not you?
Okay, why do not you try sending him a love letter?
You will do it, will not you?
I thought this might happen, so I prepared a love letter to Fakir-sama.
If you wander around school holding that, Bottom-san will come, so ask her to pass it on.
She delivers love letters for people.
Word is she knows the feelings of people in love.
We will call it The Great Lovey-Dovey Letter Operation!
Come on, we have to prepare to comfort her later!
If I gave him something like this, he would say, Do not waste time doing stupid stuff, idiot, or something.
I wonder if I would know how Mytho really feels, if I had that kind of power...
It looks like he fought with someone...
Could it be... that something is happening because a new heart shard returned to him?
I have to overcome the raven's blood, if I am a proud prince...
I wonder what kind of person Bottom-san is.
Are you agonizing over your love?
I am Bottom, friend of all those who are in love.
It is... not a tail zura.
You have got it all wrong!
I have got nothing to do with letters!
I will be sure to deliver this letter.
My friend wrote it for me, but she is got the wrong idea about which person I like...
Well, then, when you have written your real letter, bring it to me any time.
There are some circumstances that prevent it.
Um, Hermia-san, do you know people's feelings?
Well, I would not say I know them; it is more like sometimes I sense them.
Like, Ah, this person is in love, or She looks lonely; maybe she has a broken heart.
So I am always the one furthest to the back of the corps.
But one day, I noticed that I could see the feeling of being in love on everyone is backs.
The heartrending feelings of people in love.
Love is a wonderful thing, but it also makes people suffer and be sad, right?
So everyone has a hard time saying I love you, and they are all keeping their feelings inside.
I thought I would at least like to help those people.
But you know, lately it is all letters to Mytho-sama.
I deliver lots of letters to him every day, but most are from people whose feelings will not be returned...
Do you see Mytho every day, Hermia-san?
Well, actually, Mytho-sama comes to me.
So then, do you know something about Mytho's feelings?
Mytho-sama's feelings alone I just cannot figure out.
Oh, do you like Mytho-sama too, by any chance?
Oh, do you like him too, Hermia-san?
No, you have got it all wrong!
I do not have any feelings for Mytho-sama!
I have someone I like named Lysander!
I have to get more heart shards back.
Who does the prince's heart belong to?
Prince, you do not have to suffer anymore.
I will save you from your suffering.
I will not become the prince of the crows!
If you resist, your suffering will only continue.
You have raven's blood running through your veins, just like I do.
I will give you my love.
I will love you more deeply than anyone else.
You will GIVE me your love?
It is only natural for a princess to love a prince.
Lysander is someone in my grade from the sculpture division, you see, and this is one of his works!
Your heart gets warm looking at it, does not it?
It is like it is filled with the feeling of love, somehow.
He must have been thinking about somebody while he created it.
But that might have been you, Hermia-san!
I know myself better than anyone else does, so...
It is the mime for Do you mean me?!
What is that mime supposed to mean?
Will not you write a love letter?
What is that sound, I wonder...
I, um, something important's come up!
What are you doing playing with Uzura?
I keep telling you to be a little quieter!
Fakir, you are researching in books again.
I am just doing what I can, even if it is only a little.
It is not like I have cast aside my sword.
We are in the way, so let us go, okay?
I told you to be a little quieter!
Why am I so obsessed with books?
But no matter what book I open, they have all had the endings torn out.
The ghost knight's book was the same.
But I saw the end of that book in my dreams.
We have to be quiet in the library, okay?
That under-developed Hermia, of all people!
I cannot believe she is with Mytho-sama!
Did something happen with Mytho and Hermia-san?
They were holding hands and going towards the grove behind the school!
It is such a shock, is not it?
Why do not you dig with us too?
You knew I was Bottom the donkey?
You are the only one I have been looking at all this time, after all.
Even the fact that you like Lysander.
Um, here, these are today's letters!
You are my prima and mine alone, Hermia.
The reason you deliver other people's letters is so you can forget that you yourself do not have the courage to confess your own love.
You make it look like it is goodwill, but it is all for yourself.
Everyone else is using you too.
So from now on, you can just think only about yourself.
If you love me, you will not have to fool yourself.
Love only me, and regard all others with hatred.
Yes, I will love only you, and hate everyone else.
Then as proof, you will give me your beautiful heart, will not you?
If I have you, I can become a prima ballerina, cannot I?
I have had enough of being the go-between for other people's loves.
From now on, I will act for my own sake...For Mytho-sama's sake...
That is right, sacrifice your life for my sake.
Hermia-san, do not go over there.
Hermia, hurry up and come over here.
That is right, that is fine.
Is it okay to end your love?
You can just throw away a stupid love like that!
It is not stupid at all.
It is a precious feeling of yours, Hermia-san.
Being unable to say that one word is love.
But if that is truly a precious feeling, throwing it away would be cruel.
I do not want you to hide that feeling behind your back, I want you to tell him about it.
If I were allowed, I would also...
That is right, I... I have not told Lysander anything!
I have told nothing of my feelings...
The feeling that is grown to the bursting point inside you, that is real love.
That is right, what you are seeking is false love!
If this love is false, then all the love in this world is false love!
Um, um, Lysander, you might be surprised at me saying this out of the blue, but...
I made you my model without asking you because, you see, I thought when I finished it I would confess my love to you!
Yesterday, Uzura brought this to me.
Do not waste time doing stupid stuff, idiot.
Everyone just wants to BE loved, that is all!
I am sure Father's blood will save you from your suffering soon.
That is right, we have to capture a sacrifice.
I am just going to feed the foolish raven a meal, that is all.
As a little token of my thanks for awakening me.
That is right, this was the story of the prince and the raven, was not it?
In other words, the fight began a long, long time ago.
You have not forgotten that, have you, Little Duck?
Who is this woman who can take the bite out of Fakir-sama?!
An older-woman lover has made her appearance, huh!
The stories that boy wrote sometimes came true.
I will protect Mytho as a knight.
I will not take orders from you!
And it was starting to look like we would be able to work together too...
I will not allow you to hurt Raetsel!
The two of you fighting is...
You know you cannot lay a finger on me!
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I loved like I was dreaming
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I want to be there for you
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
